channel.title: Bryce's Mac Tutorials
channel.description: This podcast gives various tutorials for the Mac ranging from basic things to stuff involving the terminal.
channel.itunes:author: Bryce
channel.itunes:subtitle: Mac tutorials from a former Windows user
channel.itunes:summary: This podcast gives various tutorials for the Mac ranging from basic things to stuff involving the terminal.

item.title: Enable Right-Click
item.description: This episode covers how to turn on the right-click ability of the mighty mouse.
item.itunes:author: Bryce
item.itunes:subtitle: activate right-clicking
item.itunes:summary: This episode covers how to turn on the right-click ability of the mighty mouse.
item.itunes:keywords: Mac, Tutorials, how-to, right-click, right, click, MAC

item.title: Quitting Applications
item.description: This episode covers how to quit Mac applications.
item.itunes:author: Bryce
item.itunes:subtitle: How-to Quit Applications
item.itunes:summary: This episode covers how to quit Mac applications
item.itunes:keywords: Mac, Tutorials, how-to, quit, quitting, click, MAC, applications, Applications

item.title: Create PDFs
item.description: This episode covers how to create PDFs on the Mac.
item.itunes:author: Bryce
item.itunes:subtitle: How-to Create PDFs
item.itunes:summary: This episode covers how to make PDFs on the Mac

item.title: Mac Terminal
item.description: This episode covers some basics in the terminal on a Mac.
item.itunes:author: Bryce
item.itunes:subtitle: Mac Terminal basics
item.itunes:summary: This episode covers some basics of the mac terminal

item.title: Mac Terminal: Copy, Rename, Move
item.description: This episode covers how to move, copy, and rename files through the terminal on a mac
item.itunes:author: Bryce
item.itunes:subtitle: Mac Terminal basics part 2
item.itunes:summary: This episode covers how to move, copy, and rename files through the terminal on a mac.
item.itunes:keywords: Mac, MAC, Terminal, terminal, basics, move, copy, rename.

item.title: Bad news
item.description: Today, I have to regrettably cancel my mac tutorials podcast, due to some computer issues (only the audio version is available for this episode).
item.itunes:author: Bryce
item.itunes:subtitle: Bryce's Mac tutorials cancelled
item.itunes:summary: After dealing with too many issuses on my mac, I have to regrettably cancel the podcast.
item.itunes:keywords: Mac, MAC, Terminal, terminal, basics, move, copy, rename.

item.title: Relaunch-Mac terminal Shell scripts
item.description: I have decided to try and relaunch this podcast. In this episode, I'll be talking about how to create shellscripts.
item.itunes:author: Bryce
item.itunes:subtitle: Bryce's Mac tutorials Relaunched
item.itunes:summary: I have decided to try and relaunch this podcast. In this episode, I'll be talking about how to create shellscripts.
item.itunes:keywords: Mac, MAC, Terminal, terminal, basics, shellscripts, shellscripting.

item.title: Alias
item.description: In this episode, I will be discussing how to create aliases, shortcuts, on the mac.
item.itunes:author: Bryce
item.itunes:subtitle: Alias
item.itunes:summary: This episodes talks about how to create aliases, shortcuts.
item.itunes:keywords: Mac, MAC, basics, aliases, shortcuts, shortcut, alias

item.title: Taking A Break
item.description: Bryce's Mac tutorials will be taking a break for a few months
item.itunes:author: Bryce
item.itunes:subtitle: Alias
